lead_paragraph: Beyond the famed Angkor Wat temple, a technology known as lidar is allowing archaeologists to map and find the ancient Khmer empire’s intricate urban landscape.

headline.main: Laser Scans Unveil a Network of Ancient Cities in Cambodia

snippet: Beyond the famed Angkor Wat temple, a technology known as lidar is allowing archaeologists to map and find the ancient Khmer empire’s intricate urban landscape....
abstract: Scientists are using laser-based technology known as lidar to analyze data from aerial surveys and map outlines of Angkor, vast and ancient urban center spanning parts of Cambodia, Thailand, Vietnam and Laos; city, which existed from roughly AD 802 to 1431, has since been swallowed up by jungle.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Laser (Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation)
